title: Easy chicken tikka masala
ingredients: ['For chicken tikka', '4 chicken breasts', '1 large tub natural youghurt', '4 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '1/2 lemon, or 1 to 2 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 tablespoons tandoori masala powder', 'To make tikka masala', '4 tablespoons oil', '1 large onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon ground ginger', '1 to 2 tablespoons curry powder, or to taste']
